pageTitle: Synthetix | A decentralised payment network & stablecoin
pageDescription: Synthetixâ€™s dual token system reduces price volatility, enabling everyday cryptocurrency purchases with a stable medium of exchange.

teamMembers.title: Founder
teamMembers.bio: Before launching Synthetix, Kain built the largest cryptocurrency payment platform in Australia, with tens of millions in transaction volume.

teamMembers.title: CTO
teamMembers.bio: Justin is a former Director of Engineering at MongoDB and has significant experience designing and deploying high availability systems at scale.

teamMembers.title: VP Partnerships
teamMembers.bio: Jordan has extensive experience in sales and business development in online payments, he structured numerous enterprise deals while at Paypal.

teamMembers.title: Senior Architect
teamMembers.bio: Clinton has 18 years experience in software engineering and is a former Architect Lead at JPMorgan Chase in trading technology.

teamMembers.title: Head of Product
teamMembers.bio: Charlie has over 10 years experience in leading product and delivery teams in Europe and Australia.. He has managed several international launches for products with millions of users.

teamMembers.title: VP Operations
teamMembers.bio: Mikael has worked in director-level positions at Unibet and MyLotto24, focusing on corporate strategy and marketing/sales.

teamMembers.title: Communications Manager
teamMembers.bio: Garth graduated in Communications from the University of Sydney and has experience managing a national payments network.

teamMembers.title: dApp Engineer
teamMembers.bio: Clement completed his Masters in Maths and Computer Science before finding his passion in the start-up world. He has a strong background in full-stack engineering and crypto.

teamMembers.title: Designer
teamMembers.bio: Matt is a freelance Product Designer, aiming to bring great UX and design to decentralised applications.

teamMembers.title: dApp Engineer
teamMembers.bio: Roman has built software products for European stock exchange Deutsche Borse and several startups in Australia, focusing on fintech, blockchain and cloud innovation.

teamMembers.title: dApp Engineer
teamMembers.bio: David is a full-stack developer with 15 years experience ranging from development for start-ups to large-scale governmental projects. He is proficient in React JS & Native, Node.JS, Redux, MobX and blockchain tech.

teamMembers.title: dApp Engineer
teamMembers.bio: Martin is a software engineer with a strong full-stack development background. He has a high level of expertise in working with various technology stacks.
